name: The Marine
description: A disciplined soldier trained for combat. Starts with increased accuracy and reload speed.

name: Galactic Commander
description: A retired space officer with interstellar tactics and military precision.

name: The Convict
description: An angry ex-prisoner with a shotgun and molotov. Deals more damage when hurt.

name: Rebel Leader
description: An insurgent who rallies chaos with guerrilla gear.

name: The Hunter
description: Comes with a crossbow and a faithful companion that finds hidden items.

name: The Huntress
description: An agile tracker with high critical hit rates and speed boosts.

name: The Pilot
description: A smooth talker with access to cheap shop prices and an unreliable weapon.

name: Wingman
description: A loyal companion whose shield protects allies in battle.

name: The Bullet
description: A sentient bullet with a sword, able to dodge bullets with style.

name: The Bullet Rabbit
description: A playful variant of The Bullet wearing a rabbit hood. Cosmetic only.

name: The Bullet Shotgun Kin
description: A skin inspired by Shotgun Kin. Cosmetic and exclusive to PS4.

name: The Cultist
description: A mysterious gungeoneer only available in coop. Uses tricky gear and resurrection.

name: The Cultist The Apple
description: An alternate version fought in the Cultist’s past. Glitchy and intense.

name: The Paradox
description: A glitch in time that starts with random gear and unpredictable power.

name: The Gunslinger
description: A master of firearms who unlocks synergies with every gun.

name: The Robot
description: A cybernetic fighter who converts armor into firepower.

name: The Robot Past
description: A fearsome foe faced in the Robot’s past: EMP-R0R.
